whychooseuscontent.heading: Whether you’re choosing a natural gas supplier for the first time or switching from your utility company, here are three solid reasons to go with Grand Rapids Energy:
whychooseuscontent.termsdescription: [Purchase ENERGY STAR approved kitchen appliances that cook more efficiently.,]
whychooseuscontent.text:
1. We provide options.
    Your local utility company currently can only offer pricing that may change or remain the same each month. Want to lock in your rate with a fixed plan? GRE offers fixed plans and variable plans designed to suit your needs. Find the one that’s right for you.

  2. We care about our customers.
    Our exceptional customer service is at the ready. Call 1.800.841.1541 to speak with one of our representatives.

  3. We offer outstanding perks.
    You can earn rewards when you refer friends to sign up for GRE. Check out the details our Refer a Friend program. Also, you can earn miles with Delta just for paying your natural gas bill.
